text: @atrupar @RepGrothman LIFE literally comes at you at the speed of a COUGH. You might not be a BELIEVER; but his viral Spray & Droplets don't care. Consequences are NOT PREDICATED on what you believe. Who told you that? Consequences are entirely predicated on what you do. YOU DID THIS TO YOU! #COVID19
